data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Modern submarines and submersibles, as well as the oldest ones, usually have a single hull. Large ____ generally ____ an ____ hull ____ hull ____ outside. This ____ hull, which ____ forms ____ shape ____ submarine, is ____ the ____ hull ( casing ____ the Royal Navy ) or ____ hull, as ____ does ____ have ____ withstand a pressure ____. Inside the outer hull there is a strong hull, or pressure hull, which withstands sea pressure and has normal atmospheric pressure inside.
data.partBlankContent: Modern submarines and submersibles, as well as the oldest ones, usually have a single hull. Large subma_____ generally ha__ an addit_____ hull o_ hull sect____ outside. This exte____ hull, which actu____ forms t__ shape o_ submarine, is cal___ the ou___ hull ( casing i_ the Royal Navy ) or li___ hull, as i_ does n__ have t_ withstand a pressure diffe_____. Inside the outer hull there is a strong hull, or pressure hull, which withstands sea pressure and has normal atmospheric pressure inside.
data.answer: 现代潜艇和潜水器，以及最古老的潜艇，通常只有一个船体。大型潜艇通常有一个额外的船体或船体部分在外面。这种外部船体实际上形成了潜艇的形状，因为它不需要承受压力差，所以被称为“外部船体”(英国皇家海军的外壳)或“轻型船体”。在外壳内部有一个坚固的外壳，或压力外壳，它能承受海水的压力，并在内部有正常的大气压力。
